channel.title: Comments on: Drawings by David Chaim Smith- Thursday April 1, John Zorn at 6PM
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Eiver LaNahar
item.dc:creator: Eiver LaNahar
item.description:
Maybe it was the timing of this opening.
But I plan on attending the show before it closes. David Smith is an old friend whom I have known since Chabad created a surprise Bar Mitzvah for him when he was a RISD student, way, way back when.
He is a born kabbalist (albeit possibly more Blakean than Lurianic) and I look forward to seeing his new art works.
item.content:encoded:
Maybe it was the timing of this opening.

But I plan on attending the show before it closes. David Smith is an old friend whom I have known since Chabad created a surprise Bar Mitzvah for him when he was a RISD student, way, way back when.

He is a born kabbalist (albeit possibly more Blakean than Lurianic) and I look forward to seeing his new art works.

item.title: By: Alan Brill
item.dc:creator: Alan Brill
item.description: I am surprised that when I mentioned on the blog Archbishop Dolan speaking or Habermas speaking - readers of the blog showed up. But to hear John Zorn in an intimate setting got no readers.
item.content:encoded: I am surprised that when I mentioned on the blog Archbishop Dolan speaking or Habermas speaking – readers of the blog showed up. But to hear John Zorn in an intimate setting got no readers.
